column5: Welcome to The White House - The Perfect Superbowl Destination!  Our place is close to downtown - discovery green, Houston METRO-RAIL (direct to NRG Stadium), walking distance to Club Nomadic, parks/biking trails, art galleries, restaurants bars, breweries, shopping.  You'll love our place because of The location!!! the 4th floor patio - views! the huge kitchen and open modern floor plan, the neighborhood, the natural light, the comfy beds.
